items.sentence: If you see Tom, don\'t forget to ask him how his wife\'s doing.
Do you know why Tom didn\'t eat the sandwich Mary made for him?
Tom won\'t be here long enough to really learn how things work.
Tom pretended he was sick so he wouldn\'t have to go to school.
Tom pawned the pocket watch he had gotten from his grandfather.
I wanted to explain what had happened, but no one would listen.
I wish I had more time to do things that I really wanted to do.
Tom doesn\'t think it\'s a very good idea to go skinny dipping.
My brother-in-law would like for me to be his son\'s godfather.
I heard that Tom doesn\'t know how to sing any songs in French.
